waypoints.onload:
logFile = getExecutionPath ()..'/logs/'..getPlayerName ()..'.'..getDailyDate ("%Y%m%d")..'.txt' wpPath = getExecutionPath ()..'/waypoints/' selfFile = wpPath .. "/TQ"
saved = table.load (logFile); if saved and type (saved)=="table" then config = saved table.remove (config, 1) table.save (config, logFile); loadPaths (selfFile) else message ('something is wrong here', true); end
